The frequency of the 'B' allele (p) is therefore 1 - q = 1 - 0.30 = 0.70.
The frequency of the homozygous dominant genotype (BB) is given by p².
Calculating this gives p² = (0.70)² = 0.49.
This corresponds to option A.
